description:
Cerasus is the 13th Plantation and a home to http://anidb.net/ch92216 [Hiro] and his friends.
When it was attacked by a Mohorovic-class Klaxosaur, which was neutralized by http://anidb.net/ch92225 [Strelizia] shortly after, the damage resulted in the magma energy stockpile to plummet and thus the plantation was set to meet with http://anidb.net/ch96298 [26th Plantation] for an exchange.
Source: Darling in the Franxx Wiki
name: Cerasus
